item.title: Growth-at-Risk IMF Tool
item.description: body { text-align: justify} The International Monetary Fund (IMF) has been using Growth-at-Risk, a macro-econometric tool developed by them to assess risks to economic growth, in several article IV country reports (Albania, Portugal and Singapore 2018), Chapter 2 of the IMF Global Financial Conditions Report since October 2017 and so on. The tool is built taking the methodology developed in the AER April 2019 paper Vulnerable Growth. I have several disagreements about the statistical procedures used and the interpretation of the results in the AER paper, which you can read here in my working papers.

item.title: Tests for correct specification of conditional densities
item.description: body { text-align: justify} I have implemented the statistical tests of Rossi and Sekhposyan (2019) in R. You can find the codes in the following Github repo. Two tests, a Kolmogorov-Smirnov test and an Cràmer-von Mises test, are implemented to assess the correct specification of rolling window conditional distribution out-of-sample forecasts, one and multiple steps ahead. Thew hole idea of the test is the following: let \(X\) be a random variable with cdf \(F_X\) (with well defined \(F_X^{-1}\)).

item.title: Acerbi & Szekely Unconditional Expected Shortfall Test
item.description: body { text-align: justify} Python implementation of the Direct Expected Shortfall Test of Acerbi and Szekely (2014).I don’t know of any implementation of such test in Python. The test has been implemented in MatLab. The backtesting of Expected Shortfall has long been a dificult task due to the lack of elicitibility. The test I’ve implemented is the second test of Acerbi and Szekely and it’s full details are in the reference.

item.title: Puzzles and the Behavioural New Keynesian Model
item.description: Herein I conduct similar policy experiments to those of Carlstrom et al. (2012) with a Behavioural New Keynesian (BNK) model, instead of the standard New Keynesian model (only) or a sticky information model. The BNK model does a good job of solving previous issues with the standard model (as already noted by Gabaix). All of this work is already, explicitly or implicitly, in the cited articles, so I wouldn’t claim to show anything new.

item.title: Incidencia distributiva del gasto en formación universitaria en Cataluña
item.description: body { text-align: justify} ¿Como afecta, sólo en sus efectos más inmediatos, el gasto en formación universitaria a la distribución de renta de los hogares en Cataluña? Enric, con quien tuve el placer de coincidir durante mis estudios en la Universidad Pompeu Fabra, se formula esta pregunta en su trabajo de final de grado. También, le agradezco enormemente que compartiera sus datos conmigo, facilitando enormemente producir este post.

item.title: Determinacy in a New Keynesian Model under a Money Growth Rule
item.description: body { text-align: justify} This note derives the analytical conditions for determinacy in a canonical New Keynesian model under an exogenous path for the growth rate of the money supply. Under cash-when-I’m-done timing the model is always determinate while indeterminacy can arise with cash-in-advance timing. FULL TEXT: See in “Research” Update: Now you can also find my presentation of the paper at the IV Navarra-Basque Country Macroeconomics Workshop.

item.title: Universitat gratuïta, un dret?
item.description: body { text-align: justify} ¿No tenen totes les persones un dret a a l’educació? ¿Tenim dret a rebre una formació universitària? ¿Existeixen eixes obligacions morals? Em faig aquestes preguntes ja que aquestes són les realment importants, les de fons, les que determinen la visió del que ha de ser en la societat. Per a un anàlisis més moderat i pragmàtic recomano al lector fer una ullada a Universitat gratuïta: subvencionant els rics?

item.title: Guión de un cortometraje contra la violencia de género
item.description: body { text-align: justify} Me gustaría compartir con todos los lectores la realización de un guión que escribí hace ya un tiempo para un concurso de cortos cinematográficos contra la violencia de género. La producción final, cabe decir que dista mucho del guión original que presenté y las modificaciones implicaron mejores muy substanciales. Aquí pueden encontrar la resolución del concurso. Otra mención que debo hacer es al segundo guión premiado, cuyo efecto principal es el transmitir las lesiones que sufre la mujer maltratada a través de la teleoperadora del 016.
